fmriFile.title: Input rs-fMRI file
fmriFile.description: File with b-values of the DWI scans.

sliceTimingCorrection.title: Run slicetimer flag
sliceTimingCorrection.description: Flag whether slice timing should be corrected (using FSL sliceTimer).

preprocessingScript.title: Preprocesing script
preprocessingScript.description: Optional input arguments for FSL slicetimer. The example preprocessing script executes the following code: 'slicetimer -i fmriFileInput -o fmriFileOutput sliceTimerOptions'

forceFreesurferOverwrite.title: Freesurfer overwrite flag
forceFreesurferOverwrite.description: Flag whether the parcellation step should overwrite (if set to 'true') already existing Freesurfer files.

reconstructionMethod.title: Reconstruction method
reconstructionMethod.description: Matlab function used to calculate functional connectivity strength

saveTimeSeries.title: Export time series flag
saveTimeSeries.description: Flag indicating whether time series are saved.

regressionMask.title: Regression mask
regressionMask.description: List of FreeSurfer region codes (from the standard segmentation map, aseg.mgz) of voxels that will be used as regressor. The average signal of voxels for each region code is included as a regressor.

globalMeanRegression.title: Perform global mean regression flag
globalMeanRegression.description: Flag whether global signal regression should be performed.

filter.title: Perform bandpass filtering flag
filter.description: Flag whether bandpass filtering should be performed.

scrubbing.title: Perform scrubbing flag
scrubbing.description: Flag whether scrubbing should be performed.

maxFD.title: Maximum FD
maxFD.description: Frames with FD higher than the maximum FD are indicated to contain a violation.

maxDVARS.title: Maximum DVARS
maxDVARS.description: Frames with DVARS larger than Q3 + maxDVARS Ã— IQR are indicated to contain a violation.

minViolations.title: Minimum number of violations
minViolations.description: Frames with a number of violations larger or equal to the minimum number of violations are considered to contain motion artifacts and scrubbed from further analyses.

backwardNeighbors.title: Number of frames scrubbed backwards
backwardNeighbors.description: Number of frames preceding a violating-frame that are also excluded from analyses.

forwardNeighbors.title: Number of frames scrubbed forwards
forwardNeighbors.description: Number of frames succeeding a violating-frame that are also excluded from analyses.
